item.title: Frugal Vtubing
item.description:
In this blog post, I’ll present to you a very efficient way to Vtube using your Android device, scrcpy, REALITY App and OBS Studio. This is our goal (click on the image to see its full resolution):
--

item.title: Ethereal Sleep
item.description: I can’t pinpoint the exact date, but I was listening to Gregorian Chants, while working on something. In the heat of the moment, I though to myself, ‘this would pretty cool with some rain sounds in the background.’ I should have just dismissed the thought then, but my curiosity got the best of me. The next steps were visibly clear, I simply needed to download the soundtracks and combine them with Audacity.
